recipesJson.name: Screwed Kool Watermelon
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
Since winter is coming, here's a cool watermelon summer vape. Duh. 
You can use WS23 if you have it.

1% Cantaloupe (CAP)
2% Koolada 10% (TPA)
0.5% Menthol (LB)
2% Strawberry (TPA)
0.5% Super Sweet (CAP)
3% Sweet Strawberry (CAP)
4% Watermelon (LA)
0.5% White Peach (FA)

Enjoy & comment.
Screwdriver
